about_the_game:
“Under what?” is a short but very capacious story-tale about an old fisherman who suddenly faced the surface of the water. In this story there will be no dragons, the battle of good and evil, and other boring nonsense. But there will be some bad jokes and extraordinary characters.


This visual novel is absolutely free (so if you think to sell it to someone, do not forget to share the earnings). It doesn’t require on-time spell casting and late game artefacts. It is recommended in a relaxed atmosphere with a cup of tea.


I would call this project an interactive comic rather than a visual novel or game. I spent much more time on development than I thought. I hope you will enjoy it!

name: Under What?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
